humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are metastases in 8 out of 13 lymph nodes from the left axillary dissection (AJCC 7th Edition). This corresponds to N2 (4 to 9 positive lymph nodes) based on the new rules provided.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in seven of eight left axillary lymph nodes and one of five additional left axillary lymph nodes, which corresponds to a pathologic N2 stage based on the AJCC Cancer Staging Manual, 7th Edition.
